chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a b c d : AV, R (plus (plus a (plus b c)) (plus d d)) (plus a (plus (plus d b) (plus d c)))

Premises:
*** [ plus : AV -> AV -> AV ]
*** [ AV : Type ]
*** [ R : AV -> AV -> Prop ]
calcul4 : forall a b c d : AV, R (plus (plus a b) (plus c d)) (plus (plus a c) (plus b d))
point_angle.calcul4 : forall a b c d : AV, R (plus (plus a b) (plus c d)) (plus (plus a c) (plus b d))
calcul2 : forall a b c d : AV, R (plus (plus a (plus b c)) d) (plus (plus a (plus b d)) c)
calcul3 : forall a b c d e f : AV, R (plus (plus a (plus b c)) (plus d (plus e f))) (plus (plus a d) (plus (plus b e) (plus c f)))
regulier : forall a b c d : AV, R a c -> R (plus a b) (plus c d) -> R b d
compatible : forall a b c d : AV, R a b -> R c d -> R (plus a c) (plus b d)
compatible_croix : forall a b c d : AV, R a b -> R c d -> R (plus a d) (plus b c)
plus_assoc : forall a b c : AV, R (plus a (plus b c)) (plus (plus a b) c)
calcul : forall a b c : AV, R (plus a (plus b c)) (plus b (plus a c))
plus_sym : forall a b : AV, R (plus a b) (plus b a)
double_plus : forall a b : AV, R (double (plus a b)) (plus (double a) (double b))
exists_opp_angle : forall a : AV, exists b : AV, R (plus a b) zero
zero_plus_a : forall a : AV, R (plus zero a) a
Chasles_2 : forall u v w t : V, R (cons u t) (plus (cons u v) (plus (cons v w) (cons w t)))
somme_pi : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons u v) (plus (cons w (opp u)) (cons (opp v) (opp w)))) pi
somme_permute : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons v u) (plus (cons (opp u) w) (cons (opp w) (opp v)))) pi
somme_triangle : forall A B C : PO, R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (plus (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)))) pi
transitive : forall a b c : AV, R a b -> R b c -> R a c
permute : forall u v : V, R (plus (cons u v) (cons v u)) zero
plus_zero : forall u v : V, R (plus (cons u v) zero) (cons u v)
zero_plus : forall u v : V, R (plus zero (cons u v)) (cons u v)
u_oppv : forall u v : V, R (cons u (opp v)) (plus (cons u v) pi)
oppu_v : forall u v : V, R (cons (opp u) v) (plus pi (cons u v))
Chasles : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons u v) (cons v w)) (cons u w)
R_double : forall a b : AV, R a b -> R (double a) (double b)
symetrique : forall a b : AV, R a b -> R b a
triangle_isocele : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (double (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)))) pi
isocele_permute : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A C) (vec A B)) (double (cons (vec B A) (vec B C)))) pi
BinInt.Z.mod_bound_or : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.modulo a b) /\ BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.modulo a b) b \/ BinInt.Z.lt b (BinInt.Z.modulo a b) /\ BinInt.Z.le (BinInt.Z.modulo a b) BinNums.Z0
BinInt.Z.div_mul_cancel_r : forall a b c : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> c <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.div (BinInt.Z.mul a c) (BinInt.Z.mul b c) = BinInt.Z.div a b
BinInt.Z.div_mod : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> a = BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.mul b (BinInt.Z.div a b)) (BinInt.Z.modulo a b)
pi_plus_zero = ex_ind (fun (u : V) (_ : u = u) => transitive (compatible (symetrique (angle_plat u)) (reflexive zero)) (transitive (plus_zero u (opp u)) (angle_plat u))) non_vide_V : R (plus pi zero) pi
BinInt.Z.pow_gt_lin_r : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) a -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.lt b (BinInt.Z.pow a b)
BinInt.Z.sqrt_up_le_square : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.le a (BinInt.Z.mul b b) < -> BinInt.Z.le (BinInt.Z.sqrt_up a) b
BinInt.Z.div_lt_upper_bound : forall a b q : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.lt a (BinInt.Z.mul b q) -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.div a b) q
BinInt.Z.bits_inj : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.eqf (BinInt.Z.testbit a) (BinInt.Z.testbit b) -> a = b
pi_plus_pi = ex_ind (fun (u : V) (_ : u = u) => transitive (compatible (symetrique (angle_plat u)) (symetrique (oppu_u u))) (transitive (Chasles u (opp u) u) (angle_nul u))) non_vide_V : R (plus pi pi) zero
BinInt.Z.div_pos : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a -> BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.div a b)
BinInt.Z.lxor_spec : forall a b n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.testbit (BinInt.Z.lxor a b) n = xorb (BinInt.Z.testbit a n) (BinInt.Z.testbit b n)
BinInt.Z.ldiff_spec : forall a b n : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.testbit (BinInt.Z.ldiff a b) n = (BinInt.Z.testbit a n && negb (BinInt.Z.testbit b n))%bool

```  
intros a b c d.
apply (calcul4 a (plus b c) d d).
rewrite plus_assoc.
rewrite plus_assoc.
apply (calcul4 a b c (plus d d)).
Qed.  
```

original: intros a b c d. apply (calcul4 a (plus b c) d d). rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite plus_assoc. apply (calcul4 a b c (plus d d)).
